docs.text: Mr.Penguino Docs Welcome to the documentation for my awesome Discord bot! In this documentation, I will be going over all of the commands that I have created over the years with my old AND faithful companion, Mr.Penguino ^^ Features AI moderation Auto moderation Reaction roles Temp bans User warnings Appeals system Getting Started Invite the bot to your server Use /help to see available commands
